feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:58 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: W 19 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
